sentences.sContent: He got into his car and drove off.
sentences.sCn: 他上了车，随即开车走了。

sentences.sContent: Suddenly they turned off and parked in a side road.
sentences.sCn: 突然他们拐出去停在一条岔路上。

sentences.sContent: Once we were off the main freeway, the trip felt more like a vacation.
sentences.sCn: 我们一离开主高速公路，旅途的感觉就更像是度假了。

sentences.sContent: Her husband was off on a business trip somewhere.
sentences.sCn: 她丈夫到什么地方出差去了。

sentences.sContent: Are you ready? Off we go.
sentences.sCn: 你准备好了吗？ 我们走吧。

sentences.sContent: I must be off now (= I must leave ).
They were off to Italy (= leaving to go to Italy ) and wanted to make an early start.
sentences.sCn: 他们要去意大利，想早点出发。

phrases.pCn: [英国俚语]从头开始；从起点开始，从一开始

words.tran: 冷漠的；不亲热的；疏远的
